title: HyeVtoRqtQ
content: Trellis networks are a new architecture for sequence modeling, combining temporal convolutional networks with special structure and weight tying. They outperform current state-of-the-art methods in various language modeling tasks and stress tests for long-term memory retention. The code for Trellis networks, a new architecture for sequence modeling, can be found at https://github.com/locuslab/trellisnet.
